title: Changes to Seymour to Albury coach timetable
articleContent:
Changes to Seymour to Albury coach timetable

From Saturday 24 February, there will be changes to coach services between Seymour and Albury.Â 

An additional return coach will run on Saturdays and Sundays between Albury and Seymour, connecting with Seymour Line trains to and from Melbourne, giving passengers more options for travelling.

Two additional return coaches will run on Saturdays and Sundays between Albury and Wangaratta.

The weekday 11:09am Seymour to Albury coach will make additional stops at Wangaratta and Benalla.

The weekday 5:21am Albury to Seymour coach will depart 10 minutes earlier at 5:11am and make additional stops at Benalla and Wangaratta.

These scheduled coach services are listed in the Albury Line timetable.

The new timetable is available from Monday 5 February 2024 at ptv.vic.gov.au or vline.com.au or the V/Line mobile app.

For more information, please visit vline.com.au or call 1800 800 007.
articleDescription: From Saturday 24 February, there will be changes to coach services between Seymour and Albury, with new additional services.
